member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.IDirectoryContents
member.summary: Represents a directory's content in the file provider.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.IDirectoryContents.Exists
member.summary: True if a directory was located at the given path.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.IFileInfo
member.summary: Represents a file in the given file provider.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.IFileInfo.Exists
member.summary: True if resource exists in the underlying storage system.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.IFileInfo.Length
member.summary: The length of the file in bytes, or -1 for a directory or non-existing files.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.IFileInfo.PhysicalPath
member.summary: The path to the file, including the file name. Return null if the file is not directly accessible.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.IFileInfo.Name
member.summary: The name of the file or directory, not including any path.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.IFileInfo.LastModified
member.summary: When the file was last modified

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.IFileInfo.IsDirectory
member.summary: True for the case TryGetDirectoryContents has enumerated a sub-directory

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.IFileInfo.CreateReadStream
member.summary: Return file contents as readonly stream. Caller should dispose stream when complete.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.IFileProvider.GetFileInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Locate a file at the given path.
member.param: Relative path that identifies the file.
member.returns: The file information. Caller must check Exists property.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.IFileProvider.GetDirectoryContents(System.String)
member.summary: Enumerate a directory at the given path, if any.
member.param: Relative path that identifies the directory.
member.returns: Returns the contents of the directory.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.IFileProvider.Watch(System.String)
member.param: Filter string used to determine what files or folders to monitor. Example: **/*.cs, *.*, subFolder/**/*.cshtml.
member.returns: An that is notified when a file matching is added, modified or deleted.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.NotFoundDirectoryContents.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
member.returns: An enumerator to an empty collection.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.NotFoundFileInfo.#ctor(System.String)
member.param: The name of the file that could not be found

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.NotFoundFileInfo.CreateReadStream
member.summary: Always throws. A stream cannot be created for non-existing file.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.NullChangeToken
member.summary: An empty change token that doesn't raise any change callbacks.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.NullChangeToken.RegisterChangeCallback(System.Action{System.Object},System.Object)
member.summary: Always returns an empty disposable object. Callbacks will never be called.
member.returns: A disposable object that noops on dispose.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.NullFileProvider
member.summary: An empty file provider with no contents.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.NullFileProvider.GetDirectoryContents(System.String)
member.param: A path under the root directory. This parameter is ignored.
member.returns: A that does not exist and does not contain any contents.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.NullFileProvider.GetFileInfo(System.String)
member.param: A path under the root directory.
member.returns: A representing a non-existent file at the given path.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.NullFileProvider.Watch(System.String)
member.param: Filter string used to determine what files or folders to monitor. This parameter is ignored.
member.returns: A that does not register callbacks.
